articles.title: How the media must fight for American democracy: Atlantic, NPR, AP offer lessons - The Washington Post
articles.description: Journalists stepped it up in 2021, but now we need a concerted effort.

articles.title: Oops! Harry Potter reunion show uses photo of Emma Roberts instead of Emma Watson - CNA
